column4: Gilead ne babanyin no Makir ne babanyin no
column6: ne mbabaa a wofi Josef ne babanyin Manaasɛ ebusua mu no
column7: twee bɛnee: na ne babaa no hɔn edzin nye yi; Mahala

column4: nye mbapɔmba no nye mboanofo no nyinara enyim
column7: "Hɛn egya wui wɔ sar no do
column8: nna onnyi kuw no a wohyiahyiaa hɔnho dze tsiaa EWURADZE wɔ Kora kuw no mu no mu: mbom owui wɔ nankasa no bɔn mu: na oennya mbabanyin."

column2: "Ebɛnadze ntsi na hɛn egya ne dzin mpepa mfi n'ebusua mu
column3: dɛ oennya ɔbanyin ntsi? Ma hɛn egyapadze wɔ hɛn egya no nuanom mu."

column2: "Na Moses dze hɔn asɛm no baa EWURADZE enyim."

column4: "Zelofehad ne mbabaa no aka no tsenn: ɔma na ma hɔn egyapadze wɔ hɔn egya no nuanom mu; na ma hɔn egya n'egyapadze no nkɔ hɔn hɔ."

column5: ɔno hom mma n'egyapadze nkɔ ne babaa hɔ."

column3: ɔno hom mfa n'egyapadze mma no nuanom."
ɔno hom mfa n'egyapadze mma n'egya no nuanom."
ɔno hom mfa n'egyapadze mma no bɔgyaa a ɔbɛn no wɔ n'ebusua mu
column4: na ɔmfa: na iyi nyɛ atsɛmbu ahyɛdze mma Israelmba
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column4: na kɔhwɛ asaase a medze ama Israelmba no."

column3: wo so akɛka wo nkorɔfo ho
column4: dɛ mbrɛ wo nua Aaron akɛka hɔn ho no:"

column2: "osiandɛ hom yɛɛ asoɔdzen wɔ m'asɛm ho wɔ Zin sar do
column4: dɛ nkyɛ hom tsew mo ho wɔ nsu no ho wɔ hɔn enyim. (Iyi nye Meriba nsu no wɔ Kades wɔ Sin sar do no.)"

column6: nhwehwɛ ɔbanyin bi nsi mboanofo no do a"

column3: na obedzi hɔn enyim aba mu a obegya hɔn epue
column4: na ɔdze hɔn bɛba mu; amma EWURADZE no mboanofo aannyɛ dɛ nguan a wonnyi oguanhwɛfo."

column5: ɔbanyin a sunsum no wɔ no mu no
column6: na fa wo nsa gu no do;"

column3: nye mboanofo no nyinara enyim; na hyɛ no mbra wɔ hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na fa w'enyimnyam no bi ma no
column3: ma Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara ntsie no."
ɔno na obebisa Urim a ase nye kan no
column4: atsɛmbu ama no wɔ EWURADZE enyim: na n'asɛm do na womfir edzi
column5: na n'asɛm do na wɔmbra mu
column6: ɔno nye Israelmba nyinara a wɔka no ho nyina

column2: "Na Moses yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no nyinara: na ɔfaa Josua
column3: na ɔdze no kegyinaa ɔsɔfo Eleazar

column2: "na ɔdze ne nsa guu no do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE nam Moses do kae no."
